title: Handkerchief, early–mid-20th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidered on plain weave
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Henry J. Bernheim
description: Handkerchief with two rows of hemstitching at border and embroidery in design of two cherubs, floral spray and the initials "MMB."
